entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is involved in multiple agreements and transactions, including mergers and share purchase agreements, and has a restated certificate of incorporation and bylaws.

entities.name: INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS INC.
entities.description: International Holdings Inc. is a party involved in the Agreement and Plan of Merger with NVIDIA Corporation.

entities.name: MELLANOX TECHNOLOGIES LTD.
entities.description: Mellanox Technologies Ltd. is a party involved in the Agreement and Plan of Merger with NVIDIA Corporation.

entities.name: TEAL BARVAZ LTD.
entities.description: Teal Barvaz Ltd. is a party involved in the Agreement and Plan of Merger with NVIDIA Corporation.

entities.name: ARM
entities.description: Arm is a party involved in the Share Purchase Agreement with NVIDIA and Vision Fund.

entities.name: SOFTBANK
entities.description: SoftBank is a party involved in the Share Purchase Agreement with NVIDIA and Vision Fund.

entities.name: VISION FUND
entities.description: Vision Fund is a party involved in the Share Purchase Agreement with NVIDIA and SoftBank.

entities.name: WELLS FARGO BANK
entities.description: Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, is the trustee involved in the Indenture agreement with NVIDIA Corporation.
